items.summary: Extend the backend to store and serve the mantra text (not only the meaning) per (Veda, MantraNumber) and per language (Telugu/English/Hindi), so the frontend can display the selected mantra text in the selected language.

Seed backend data for Samaveda mantra 47 so that the mantra text returned for each supported language is a translation of the user-provided Sanskrit mantra (Samaveda 47) in Telugu, English, and Hindi.

Update the frontend to fetch and display the selected mantra text in the selected language (Telugu/English/Hindi) when the user changes the Language dropdown, and render the mantra text above the meaning in the existing single-page UI.
Add/extend React Query hooks to retrieve the mantra text from the backend and integrate the new query into the existing data-loading/error/loading UI patterns.
